data.description: Pricing is one of the most important but least understood of marketing decisions. Focus on key concepts and techniques for evaluating and formulating pricing strategies through analytical and experiential learning methods.
data.title: STRATEGIC PRICING

data.description: Provides a framework for evaluating marketing problems and developing a marketing strategy. Customer, competitor, and collaborator factors are emphasized as foundations for marketing decision-making. Examines the key aspects of product, pricing, distribution, and promotion strategy.
data.title: MARKETING MANAGEMENT
